sentence.Network_en: He set his hand on my shoulder comfortingly.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把手搭在我肩上,使我感到安慰.

sentence.Network_en: "Everything's under control here," her mother said comfortingly. "You've nothing to worry about."
sentence.Network_cn: “这里一切都在控制之中。”母亲安慰她说，“没什么好担心的。”

sentence.Network_en: I definitely will work something out, I mean it, " he said comfortingly , still caressing her hand.
sentence.Network_cn: 我一定有办法.我绝不是在骗你. ” 他温和地安慰她, 依旧捏住她的左手.

list.abs: bathe actually 实际地洗澡bathe comfortingly 舒舒服服地洗澡bathe refreshingly 使人耳目一新地洗澡

entry.def: If you say that something is comforting, you mean it makes you feel less worried or unhappy.

example.ex: My mother had just died and I found the book very comforting...
example.tran: 我母亲刚去世，我从这本书中获取了不少慰藉。

example.ex: In the midst of his feelings of impotence, a comforting thought arrived.
example.tran: 正在他觉得很无奈的时候，一个令人欣慰的想法冒了出来。

means.word_mean: 1. in a comforting or consoling manner;

sentences.sentence: "one part of a strange world should be given a comfortingly familiar form"

auth_sentence.content: The beat of the trip becomes comfortingly repetitive.
auth_sentence.res_content: The beat of the trip becomes comfortingly repetitive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The beat of the trip becomes comfortingly repetitive.

auth_sentence.content: Ten passionately powerful, yet comfortingly mellow tracks all stand up in their own right.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ten passionately powerful, yet comfortingly mellow tracks all stand up in their own right.

auth_sentence.content: Thinking that it might be nice to run a lonely, remote marathon, and with May then a comfortingly long way off, I signed up.
